item.description:
@i_looter_i wrote:

client.java:15: class, interface, or enum expected public void specGFX(int gfx) { ^ client.java:17: class, interface, or enum expected mask100var2 = 6553600; ^ client.java:18: class, interface, or enum expected mask100update = true; ^ client.java:19: class, interface, or enum expected updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:20: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:23: class, interface, or enum expected public void specAttack() { ^ client.java:25: class, interface, or enum expected server.special.specialAttacks2(playerId); ^ client.java:26: class, interface, or enum expected server.special.specialAttacks3(playerId); ^ client.java:27: class, interface, or enum expected server.special.specialAttacks4(playerId); ^ client.java:28: class, interface, or enum expected server.special.specialAttacks5(playerId); ^ client.java:29: class, interface, or enum expected server.special.specialAttacks6(playerId); ^ client.java:30: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:33: class, interface, or enum expected public int specTimer = 0; ^ client.java:34: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean DDS2Damg = false; ^ client.java:35: class, interface, or enum expected public int specialAmount = 100; ^ client.java:36: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean specOn = false; ^ client.java:37: class, interface, or enum expected public void SpecDamg(int maxDamage) { ^ client.java:44: class, interface, or enum expected if (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[3] - hitDiff < 0) ^ client.java:46: class, interface, or enum expected PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = damage; ^ client.java:47: class, interface, or enum expected PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:48: class, interface, or enum expected PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:49: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:55: class, interface, or enum expected public void SpecDamgNPC(int maxDamage) { ^ client.java:60: class, interface, or enum expected if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].HP - hitDiff < 0) ^ client.java:62: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].StartKilling = playerId; ^ client.java:63: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].RandomWalk = false; ^ client.java:64: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].IsUnderAttack = true; ^ client.java:65: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitDiff = damage; ^ client.java:66: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:67: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:68: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:71: class, interface, or enum expected public void specialAtk(boolean hitTwice, int specDrain, int projectileHit) { ^ client.java:73: class, interface, or enum expected int damage = misc.random(playerMaxHit); ^ client.java:74: class, interface, or enum expected if(hitTwice){ ^ client.java:76: class, interface, or enum expected int hit = misc.random(playerMaxHit); ^ client.java:77: class, interface, or enum expected AttackingOn2.hitDiff = hit; ^ client.java:78: class, interface, or enum expected PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(hit); ^ client.java:79: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:82: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:84: class, interface, or enum expected specOn = false; ^ client.java:85: class, interface, or enum expected specialAmount -= specDrain; ^ client.java:86: class, interface, or enum expected AttackingOn2.updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:87: class, interface, or enum expected AttackingOn2.hitUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:88: class, interface, or enum expected specGFX(projectileHit); ^ client.java:89: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:90: class, interface, or enum expected public void specialAtkNPC(boolean hitTwice, int specDrain, int projectileHit) { ^ client.java:93: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:96: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:98: class, interface, or enum expected specTimer = 70; ^ client.java:99: class, interface, or enum expected specOn = false; ^ client.java:100: class, interface, or enum expected specialAmount -= specDrain; ^ client.java:101: class, interface, or enum expected specGFX(projectileHit); ^ client.java:102: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 53 errors Press any key to continue. . .

Always the error class, interface, or enum expected well the errors are only in client.java
